channel.title: Hi! Gaurav here on Gaurav Kamble
channel.description: Recent content in Hi! Gaurav here on Gaurav Kamble

item.title: Project I : Tesla Stock Price Prediction
item.description: Tesla Stock Price Prediction Referred the Tesla Stock Price dataset from Kaggle. Used the feature which included the Closing Stock Prices from the dataset. Built a Recurrent Neural Network model using LSTM to forecast the future Stock Prices of the Company. Trained the DL model on 1117 records and tested it on 575 records. Achieved : Training RMSE = 7.

item.title: Project II: Face Mask Detection
item.description: Face Mask Detection Referred the Face Mask Detection datasaet from Kaggle Built a CNN model with Transfer Learning using the convolutional layers of the VGG16 model Generated extra data from the existing dataset by using Data Augmentation Trained the CNN model on 10,000 images, validated it upon 800 images and tested the model on 992 images Achieved :

item.title: Project III : Cardiovascular Disease Prediction
item.description: Cardiovascular Disease Prediction Referred the Cardiovascular Disease dataset from Kaggle Built an ANN model to predict whether a person is wearing a mask or not Performed EDA and handled outliers present within the dataset Used Keras Tuner to optimize the hyperparameters of the ANN model Achieved : Training Accuracy = 99 % Testing Accuracy = 83 % GitHub Link of the Project

item.title: Project IV : Dissolved Oxygen Level in River Water
item.description: Dissolved Oxygen Level in River Water Referred the Dissolved Oxygen Level in River Water dataset from Kaggle The dataset contained 37 no. of features, and many of them included NaN values Dropped the features containing more than 60% of NaN values, and replaced the NaN values with the mean value of that feature for the important features Performed EDA and handled outliers present within the dataset

item.title: Project V : University Salaries Prediction
item.description: University Salaries Prediction Referred the University Salaries dataset from Kaggle which included the base pay of the Professors from the University of Vermount(UVM) from 2009 to 2021 The dataset contained 14470 records including no missing values Performed EDA and found out that there are no outliers present within the dataset Solved the problem using standard procedure as well as by using sklearn Pipeline

item.title: Chapter VI: Esmeralda
item.description: We are delighted to be able to inform the reader, that during the whole of this scene, Gringoire and his piece had stood firm. His actors, spurred on by him, had not ceased to spout his comedy, and he had not ceased to listen to it. He had made up his mind about the tumult, and was determined to proceed to the end, not giving up the hope of a return of attention on the part of the public.
